website_summaries.verdict: The Doorbell Cam Pro is a good choice, particularly if you've invested in other August products, but its higher cloud storage fees hurt its overall value.
pros: August's $199 Doorbell Cam Pro offers HD livestreaming, motion detection, two-way talk, a built-in floodlight for low-light conditions and integration with Nest and Amazon Alexa devices
cons: August charges $5 per month for cloud storage
The Doorbell Cam Pro's square shape won't fit on every doorframe and it's only compatible with mechanical chimes

customer_reviews.title: Beats Ring Doorbell Pro hands down...
customer_reviews.text: I have this and a Ring Doorbell Pro at our two places. This never loses connection, never has delays, love it! Ring on the other had spools like crazy and takes forever to connect. The action is gone by the time Ring connects... :(. Try August, you will not regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Boogaboo

customer_reviews.title: Did not work with Samsung phone
customer_reviews.text: I can not get the door bell to sink because the app struggles with the Samsung galaxy. I followed all the trouble shooting tips to shut off mobile data, shut off smart switch, auto connect to the device and it still won't work. I called their help line and went through all their troubleshooting. They had me let it die and recharge. They told me if it still didnt work they would send me one with no trouble. When I called back they made me trouble shoot all over again. They sent me a new door bell and it still doesn't work. Your doorbell won't work with samsung? I guess I will just return and buy from your competitors.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Stay away!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy any August products. I have three door knobs, two connect plugs and a doorbell cam. They are very difficult to set up and once they are they lose connection. A total waste of money and is you call customer service they will blame it on your network.
customer_reviews.author: PJC

customer_reviews.title: Not ready for prime time
customer_reviews.text: Camera couldn't maintain a wifi connection although router with strong signal is only 15' from door; frequently got "camera offline" indication. Sound through the speaker was garbled and unintelligible; conversation impossible. People standing on the porch are backlit making faces unrecognizable. No point in having this device if I can't recognize who's there and have to open the door to see what they want. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Willis Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Overall decent product
customer_reviews.text: Instructions for installing is all on the app, get your tools ready. Had it for about a month now, it works- senses motion (which you can set the sensitivity), it's usually pretty good on connecting with the wifi- which you'll need if you want to do a live-stream. Not sure where the error is, but when someone presses it will sometimes ring and other times just show a notification on your phone. There's sometimes a delay whether it be when someone presses the button or if you're live-streaming or if you get a notification on your motion sensor and pull it up to look at. Overall considering our day in age, it's a good product and worth trying out.
customer_reviews.author: Championship

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality for sound and video
customer_reviews.text: This was really easy to set up and worka great! The video and sound quality are both really clear. The application walked us through set up nicely and really pairs well with the door lock too. It had a piece included to angle in whichever you need to. That was really helpful now we can see anyone coming close to our door and get notified immediately! I also love that we can only have the notification go to our phones instead of ringing in the house like a typical door bell. That is the best feature during nap time!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda F.

customer_reviews.title: Great device, motion detecting could be more configurable.
customer_reviews.text: Installation was easy, but it took me a moment that, for whatever reason, the device works much better in my WiFi when connecting using 5G. This is odd since 5G usually has less range. In any case, ever since I installed the doorbell several weeks ago, it has been working just fine and the integration with the August lock is cool. The only thing - unlike other reviewers complaint that motion detection reacts to background motion, I find that motion detection is not sensitive enough. I have it set to 100% (max sensitivity), but it still misses people dropping off parcels just a few steps away from the doorbell.
customer_reviews.author: Clemens

customer_reviews.title: It works for the reasonable household
customer_reviews.text: I liked the integration with the August app. I liked the accessibility by using my phone. Installation was more simple then I expected and it took less time then I planned. The camera quality is good for the standards of today. I can identify people and the audio quality is what I would expect. This is not a 4k TV and you likely don't need that. If you already have an August lock then this is a nice addition. If you need a home security system or the bleeding edge then there may be other options that are more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: DefiantCls

customer_reviews.title: Good Idea.
customer_reviews.text: Good Idea....bad execution...can connect to digital doorbells. OMG...in this day and age, no digital capabilities is a real no-no. No wonder Amazon bought Ring and not August. Customer service, despite trying for over an hour to connect, had no idea about the digital connection inability. We spent a lot of money on the August lock (which works intermittently) and Doorbell Cam Pro with high hopes...but not to be!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Lewallen

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product that was easy to install. By using the app on your phone you are given step by step instructions how to install it. The video is clear and responsive. it looks so great on the front of my house several people said they were afraid to push it too hard because they did not want to break. I have the August lock also. It is nice to be able to control both from one app without running multiple apps.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Guud stuff but heavy end
customer_reviews.text: Great looking lock. The software has come a long way. Tech support is great. Not working with Apple Homekit is a bit of drag not being able to use the video. Like the two color option. Mounting hardware is also great as I have limestone on the outside of my home (Texas). Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Bill R.

customer_reviews.title: Dont fool yourself into thinking your experience will be better
customer_reviews.text: If you want to waste hours and hours trying to get this thing to work to no avail, then please buy this piece of crap. I changed my transformer, installed a wifi extender and reset the damn thing dozens of time on the advice of customer support and it still doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: A.Dulaimi

customer_reviews.title: I’m not thrilled
customer_reviews.text: Installation directions are all at-based which would be nice but when the device fails halfway through the installation process you cannot back out and you have to reset the device back to its factory settings which is not such a simple process to be honest I’m not thrilled with this device
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work in the hot area.  Central Valley California.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t work when it gets hot. It keeps loosing Wifi connection. It was never mention that in it over heats during summer. I live In Lemoore and during summer it gets very hot. I tried to return it but they said it was more than 30 days. It only works when the temperature is cooler. Any other unit I can use that can handle the Central Valley heat? Help pls. Any suggestions?
customer_reviews.author: Techie James

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but...
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to install, you don't need to turn off the power to the door bell to wire it up though. The motion sensor is a bit to sensitive. I live on a busy street and if anything as large as a three row suv drives by, it tells me. However, that's usually when a reflection of light triggers it with the motion. Wish you could set the boundary for it to look for motion. Plus, the WiFi doesn't always hold for the signal to transmit the live feed. My booster is pretty strong, too. With that said, happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: James V

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware, this is expensive garbage.
customer_reviews.text: You’ll need this: August Support: 844-284-8781. Had the cam replaced three times and the mount once. Never worked as advertised. Constant disconnects from power and ineffective customer support unable to do anything. This would be a great purchase if you’re lonely and want to talk to support every other day to try and get this garbage box to work. DO NOT BUY THIS.
customer_reviews.author: KB Ray

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend unless you want headaches.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for around 8 months and have constant connection issues with it. It’s been updated twice to the latest firmware. Signal is good and routers are plugged into a UPC so should not have any power outage issues. About once a week it will disconnect and then I have to go through the reset process. Take the doorbell camera off the mount and hit the reset button and then reattach. After it re-boots it will reconnect to the WiFi and work fine again for another week. I’ve gotten the run around from their tech support and 8 months later I still don’t have a reliable working product.
customer_reviews.author: johnuf78

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: I have other Agust products but I only opened the box and this screams of quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Clapp

customer_reviews.title: Not Reliable
customer_reviews.text: This doorbell never worked from the start. The WIFI drops intermittently daily. We had trouble with their support which deflected calls and them when we did get a hold of them, they said they would replace it after we walked through a number of tests and determined it was a hardware issue. The next day they sent an email that they will not replace it because it’s outside of the warranty ! Staty far away from this device.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: Everything From August is worth the cost including this. Slight struggle on the install due to the flat connection points for the wires but everything else is AMAZING including their customer service. I honestly spent money to have an electrician double check wires because their products are amazing
customer_reviews.author: Omar Kaif

customer_reviews.title: Good Video / Audio for Package Security
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! Provides good video and sound quality and is ideal for package delivery verification. While setup was simple and the instructions walked through the process well, I would suggest using the live feed of the camera to decide whether you need the wedge feature as well as what orientation it should be in. I thought I needed greater vertical view but after first install ended up removing and rotating the view for a better view of the walkway.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Not for me...
customer_reviews.text: After researching top / best smart doorbells, I gave this one a shot. Upon initial setup, which was easy, doorbell app stayed more offline that online. Tested WiFi and network, no issues. Too inconsistent for me so it was returned. Went with one of the other top two smart doorbells. Had high hopes.
customer_reviews.author: Scott M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent 24hour cam with audio/video feed to your cell phone and Alexa.
customer_reviews.text: This is an attractive bell and it works well. Like the fact it calls out motion even when no one rings bell. Camera has nice wide angle view of front of property. Don’t hesitate to call August who were very helpful in setup with Wi-Fi.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy E. Simmons

customer_reviews.title: An amazing doorbell cam!!
customer_reviews.text: We love the color photo as well as the lock integration The ability to view ,speak/hear then unlock the door is great. My wife loves and uses it often The doorbell actually rings in the phone too .
customer_reviews.author: The Dude

customer_reviews.title: Might be an abandoned product line
customer_reviews.text: Constantly losing 5GHz connection. Just use 2.4. Backend seems to be sloppy compared to where it was previously. Also looks to be discontinued on the manufacture website.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: No way to adjust for backlighting. Do not expect ...
customer_reviews.text: No way to adjust for backlighting. Do not expect it to work on a shadowed porch in the daylight if you can't angle away from the light.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Vance

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very good doorbell cam. Very good in catching motion and send videos quickly. I wasn’t able to activate the audio so I’m not sure if has a feature to talk with visitor. I also purchased August smart lock which I love because I live in Brazil and I am able to open and close my door from here.
customer_reviews.author: rose marie

customer_reviews.title: Better than ring
customer_reviews.text: I chose this over a ring because it synced so well with their smart lock and the smart key pad. Got full range smart features
customer_reviews.author: Nic Thorp

customer_reviews.title: Great device, very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Installation was easy. Device works well providing you have a good Wi-Fi signal. Interface through the phone app is easy to understand and use. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s good
customer_reviews.text: Would like digital chime compatibility and maybe a wider camera field of view but for the most part it’s as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew N.

customer_reviews.title: Buy this one!
customer_reviews.text: High quality video, free 24 hour archive. Motion detection is great and adjustable (so you dont pick up the garbage truck driving by for example)
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Catt

customer_reviews.title: August just works!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the August Doorbell camera. Ordered the angle mount as well. Did not think about a chime. Really would like a compatible door chime to go with it. Device works perfectly. Also order the door lock and that has been awesome heavy usage.
customer_reviews.author: johnc

customer_reviews.title: Great response time. Quality picture
customer_reviews.text: What a great camera!! Easy to install!! Great picture! Real nice.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Conyers

customer_reviews.title: Good for a year or so then goes bad
customer_reviews.text: It was descent till it lasted. Now it keeps disconnecting from wifi and power. Already tried resetting it, cleaning power terminals and still same issue. Will have to get a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Solid product
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid product which will work for any residence with an existing deadbolt. It was easy to install. My only complaint is that the door sensor provided with my dark grey lock is white. I would have expected the sensor to more closely resemble my lock in color.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Quick and simple to install
customer_reviews.text: Great product and easy to install. Good resolution video however speaker volume/quality to speak with guest could be better
customer_reviews.author: Zubair Chowdhury

customer_reviews.title: Excellent motion  detection very few  false alarms
customer_reviews.text: For superior to the ring doorbell camera excellent quality well designed and very functional Wi-Fi interface
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s a solid product
customer_reviews.text: Love this all in all..... it is a pain in the honey resetting the systems but not more so than any others
customer_reviews.author: Mark and Michael

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Horrible horrible horrible.... go with a ring. After rewiring my existing doorbell with a new transformer for power it still did not work. Went with Ring and BAM it magically worked I even went so far as to hire an electrical contractor to check the wiring work before switching brands.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Keisling

customer_reviews.title: August Door Bell Cam
customer_reviews.text: It’s a pretty good product. I feel a bit more secure with the August Door Bell Cam
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Hamil

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. Works flawlessly and has a very easy install/setup! I can't recommend it enough!
customer_reviews.author: Shane Reeves

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Doorbell
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product that is very easy to install and configure. I’ve had ring doorbells as well and this August product is the next level in terms of quality and capability.
customer_reviews.author: David McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Superior to alternatives.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great - much better curb appeal than lots of other options out there. August also offers 24hr free review of footage with no monthly subscription service. Easy install, good audio, App easy to use. Still working great 2 years in.
customer_reviews.author: James M Pattarini

customer_reviews.title: Won't stay connected to WiFi
customer_reviews.text: Works ok when it's connected, but it's not usually connected. Only other issue is that if it's mounted 90 degrees rotated, there should be something in the software that can turn the image on your phone
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: $200 Piece of Junk
customer_reviews.text: Writing this while on hold with Customer Service to try and get this $200 piece of junk replaced. It would appear they don't have any quality control. Maybe the next one will work better. It never displayed any video better than what the screen shots show.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great product 🙌🏻
customer_reviews.text: This doorbell camera is the best. I bought it after purchasing the August door lock. The products and app are so easy to use and provide peace of mind and security.
customer_reviews.author: Lea Mazzarella

customer_reviews.title: Offline frequently
customer_reviews.text: I bought the doorbell for half year and it disconnects frequently, and now no matter, I reboot it, use factory reset, reconnect to WiFi, it just disconnects 10 seconds afterwards- so basically it no longer works
customer_reviews.author: Ling Yuet Man

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: This works very well for us. We have teenagers so it’s great to not worry about keys and the door being locked or not.
customer_reviews.author: Colette Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Easy peasy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and setup. Works well with my August Smart lock
customer_reviews.author: Texanbrit

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: awesome. u don't need drill or nails to set this up to ur home. u just need powerplug. It have been selling on amazon store.
customer_reviews.author: Kenji Maximilian Hattori

customer_reviews.title: solid doorbell camera
customer_reviews.text: dig that this camera is integrated with our august smart lock. would be cool to be an option to link to wifi speakers for more of a "doorbell" audio experience.
customer_reviews.author: jj (ny)

customer_reviews.title: Good and Installation is not difficult.
customer_reviews.text: The doorbell is good. The motion detection is quite sensitive. But the Bluetooth connection with the door lock set is sometimes poor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s not the police friendly Ring!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, easy install, and it’s not the police friendly Ring brand.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: No batteries
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. If was a little wider view would work better for side door facing door bell
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: ... cam pro And the the resolution is awful not good at all I call them to see what is ...
customer_reviews.text: I have one week using the August doorbell cam pro And the the resolution is awful not good at all I call them to see what is can cause this and they hang out of me so basically what they said about full HD IS NOT REAL. Example below.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Diaz

customer_reviews.title: WiFi problem
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like that it keeps losing WiFi that’s a problem
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WiFi extender needed on concrete block and stucco.
customer_reviews.text: The August door bell works great, in fact so great that my neighbor across the street had me install one for him!
customer_reviews.author: claudia

customer_reviews.title: Cool product
customer_reviews.text: Camera view is amazing! I also love that Alexa will say “motion at the door” lol cool product
customer_reviews.author: Wade Preston JR

customer_reviews.title: Can’t register account
customer_reviews.text: The product can’t register account for new user! Wrote Email to August no response from them!
customer_reviews.author: ivanlim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: no comments so far. work really well to my expectation.
customer_reviews.author: Wily

customer_reviews.title: Just a big waste of time.
customer_reviews.text: Such a disappointment! Could not pair it to any device for the installation. Just a big waste of time reading through the useless support instructions. Well, good thing I did not buy the door lock too. Will go for a different system.
customer_reviews.author: UC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A great doorbell camera. I have it paired to an August 3rd generation smart lock. Works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I cannot get this to work and customer support was not helpful
customer_reviews.author: Tammy A Davis

customer_reviews.title: Need a monthly subscription
customer_reviews.text: I sent this back due to needing a monthly subscription as the only option for recording video.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Hart

product_meta.title: August Home AUG-AB02-M02-G02 Dark Gray August Doorbell Cam Pro
product_meta.description: August Doorbell Cam Pro lets you answer your door from anywhere. Hindsight and trade constantly monitors your doorway and captures the moments before a motion alert. The free, basic video recording subscription, lets you replay any videos from the last 24 hours. August Doorbell Cam Pro pairs with any August Smart Lock.
feature_bullets: Works with Alexa for voice control (Alexa device sold separately).
Always home. Real-time alerts, HD video and two-way audio makes it easy to answer your door as if you were home.
Know who’s there from anywhere. Get real-time alerts on your phone whenever someone approaches your doorstep, even when you’re not home.

Never miss a moment. August Doorbell Cam Pro records and stores video of each moment at your door. The free, basic video recording subscription, lets you replay any videos from the last 24 hours. Upgrade to premium video recording to access 30 days of stored video recordings.
Let guests in from your phone. Doorbell Cam Pro pairs with all August Smart Locks to easily let guests into your home.

Get the whole story. HindSight constantly monitors your doorway and will capture the moments leading up to a motion alert. Review all videos for free for up to 24 hours with the included basic video recording subscription.
Easy, DIY installation. Works with existing wiring to replace your mechanical chime doorbell. The included USB dock allows complete setup inside your home prior to installation.

Full-color HD at night. Don’t waste time with grainy infrared nighttime video. The built-in floodlight delivers clear, full color HD video even at night. Requires iOS (9.0 or higher) or Android (5.0 or higher) smartphone

specifications.Included Components: August Doorbell Cam Pro, USB Charging Dock, Mounting Hardware: Electrical sealing putty, 4 screw anchors, 2 mounting screws, 1 mounting wedge, 2 screws for mounting wedge.
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars284 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
